songs.title: Kali Denali
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Lafzan da khel alfazan da mel
Wajdi beat main Weed pee ke
Gaddi di seat ch likhda geet....
Umeed mainu lokan nu
Pasand aaun mere geet
Mere geet sun loki sikhde ne aithe di reet....
Ve rasam revaj ess desh de
Bhang ape pinde chitta
Dujeyan nu vechde.... (beat)
Gall gall te gaali galoch
Ve Jadon da main jameya
Main ghar waleyan te boj....
Meri soch nashe ch mainu ni hosh
Main cociane pitti mainu
Chareya ve josh....
Mere nerhe ne jehre
Oh ajanabi ne saare
Mere ton door rehnde ne
Mere ghar wale....
Meri akhan laal chup chup
Nashe ch choor
Vekhde ne mainu haan de munde ghoor ghoor....
Ve jehra mere mukable da muhre aa ke khange mere
Na te bohemia iraade nahio change mere....

[Hook : R.D]
Kali denali with a frame on top (yeah)
Rims keep spining every time I stop (yeah)
One in my brain with a plastic glock (bohemia)
One in the drain when we bash the cops (yeah)

[Bridge]
Kali denali gaddi de shishe kaale
Mere piche piche lagge 24 ghante police wale
Jinde jad pinde rehnde duniya ton door rehnde
Vairiyan nu sheran wangu khaan nu pende

[Verse 2]
Meri zindagi ch
Din thode te raatan kali
Kali denali vich firde munde mavali
Nale gaddi de shishe kitte kale (huhuhan)
Main laapta mere piche police wale
Mere ton hoyi khata mere te ve ilzam
Gori aadmi de bhes ch desi putt jawan
Challeya umeedan lai ke te kinne sapne
Ethe peeth piche mainu luttan mere apne
Par koi vaddi gall nai
Mere vairiyan nu chain ek pal nai
Gaddi de shishe thalle karan mooh kadan bahar
Bandookan challan goliyan ve
Kinne bache kinne mare mainu matlab nahi
Palle mere kakh nahi
Meri zindagi da koi maksad nai
Hun karlo jo karna
Ve ek din apa sareyan ne marna ve
Jind naal khedan mainu maut kolon darr nai

[Hook : R.D. & Bohemia (x2)]
Kali denali with a frame on top (yeah)
Rims keep spining every time I stop (yeah)
One in my brain with a plastic glock (ahaan)
One in the drain when we bash the cops (yeah)
[Outro]
Kali denali gaddi de shishe kaale
Mere piche piche lagge 24 ghante police wale
Jinde jadon pinde rehnde duniya toon door
Rehnde
Vairiyan nu sheran wangu khaan nu pende
